required.name: Australia
required.note: May apply online. Transit visa is not required.

required.name: China
required.note: 72-hours visa free visit when in transit at Beijing, Chengdu, Chongqing, Dalian, Guangzhou, Guilin, Shanghai, Shenyang and Xi'an.

required.name: Republic of Ireland
required.note: Visa waiver for UK 'C' visa holders until October 2016. Entry permitted only if first point of entry to the Common Travel Area is in the UK.

required.name: Mozambique
required.note: Visa on arrival is no longer available to citizens of countries that host an embassy of Mozambique.

required.name: Somalia
required.note:
30 days, provided an invitation letter issued by the sponsor has been submitted
to the Airport Immigration Department at least 2 days before arrival.

evisa.name: Ivory Coast
evisa.note: 3 months; eVisa holders must arrive via Port Bouet Airport.

evisa.name: Gabon
evisa.note: Electronic visa holders must arrive via Libreville International Airport.

evisa.name: Kenya
evisa.note: 3 months; also visa on arrival until 1 September 2015

on-arrival.name: Azerbaijan
on-arrival.note: 30 days; obtainable at any international airport.

on-arrival.name: Tajikistan
on-arrival.note: 45 days at Dushanbe International Airport. Visa also available online. E-visa holders can enter through all border points.

on-arrival.name: Zambia
on-arrival.note: 90 days; also eligible for a universal visa allowing access to Zimbabwe.

on-arrival.name: Zimbabwe
on-arrival.note: 90 days; also eligible for a universal visa allowing access to Zambia.
